api_base_url.hint: 图片生成 API 的基础地址

api_keys.hint: 图片生成 API 的密钥列表，支持多个密钥自动轮换

default_model.hint: 默认使用的图片生成模型

basic_generation.hint: 配置基础生图指令的触发词和参数

commands.hint: 每个项是一个 JSON 字符串，包含 trigger、prompt、negative_prompt、model 字段。可动态添加删除。
default: {"trigger": "手办化", "prompt": "Create a 1/7 scale commercialized figure of the character in the illustration, in a realistic style and environment. Place the figure on a computer desk, using a circular transparent acrylic base without any text. On the computer screen, display the ZBrush modeling process of the figure. Next to the computer screen, place a BANDAI-style toy packaging box printed with the original artwork.", "negative_prompt": "low quality, blurry", "model": ""}
